name: ScoreAI
description:
AI-Powered Lead Scoring for HubSpot

Automatically score and prioritize your leads using AI trained on your real customer dataâ€”not generic rules. This app helps sales and marketing teams focus on the highest-value opportunities by analyzing your Contacts, Companies, and Deals against what makes a great customer for you.

Whether you're on Starter, Professional, or Enterprise, you can easily define what an ideal or non-ideal customer looks like, and let the system do the restâ€”delivering a dynamic lead score and an AI-generated summary for every record.

ðŸ”‘ Key Features:
 - Works across all HubSpot tiers
 - Score Contacts, Companies, and Deals
 - Trained on your actual ideal & non-ideal customers
 - Includes AI-generated explanations for transparency
 - No need for complex workflows or static rules
 - Seamlessly updates scores as your data evolves

Take the guesswork out of lead scoringâ€”get better alignment between sales and marketing, faster follow-ups, and more closed deals.
